name: Puzzle Hero: Monster Mayhem
description:
Puzzle Hero Monster Mayhem. is the second game in my Puzzle Hero "franchise". 

The story follows Alex as he tries to save his Friend from the Evil Witch. Alex found out that the Evil Witch was hiding in a cave, but the problem is that the cave is full to the brim of monsters. Can Alex get through the cave unscathed and save his friend?

The game contains 10 short and simple puzzles
